Name: Brutal Wizardry
About the game: Brutal Wizardry is a magic shooter with procedural level generation in virtual reality. You will fight against hordes of dark fantasy enemies using magic wands that will shoot fireballs, lightning and other magic. Earn gold, get new weapons and learn perks. Move to choose the most advantageous position, activate mechanisms and traps to destroy your enemies. Protect yourself with a shield. Learn the mechanics and interact with dynamic objects to destroy creatures most efficiently. VR-Exclusive Mechanics Telekinesis, bow, shields Magic Various Mechanisms and Traps Combine with telekinesis A Lot of Magic Weapons 8 wands and 10 additional weapons - shields and other stuff Randomly Generated Arenas Due to procedural generation, each new level will be different from the previous one. Movement Options and Interaction teleportation and/or smoooth locomotion snap turn and smooth rotation Left/right primary hand
